website_summaries.verdict: This stove guard gives you extra height to keep children from knobs or reaching onto a  hot stove.
pros: Can work on both a cooktop and a range
Looks more attractive than other models
This puts the stove out of sight for a toddler
Adjusts to fit your stove size
cons: The walls require you to adjust the way you use your pans with long handles, which limits your usage of the stove top a bit

customer_reviews.title: Gets super hot
customer_reviews.text: Product looks great. But seeing as it is made of metal, it gets extremely hot and is pretty much useless. Now we Only put it on after cooking so we don’t have to worry while the stove cools down.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Ralston

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and handsome protection
customer_reviews.text: I really wasn't sure whether to purchase this because it had so little feedback, but so far it's perfect for what we needed. I'm trying to keep my 2 year old safe from the stove top, without completely restructuring our open floor plan. We only use the back burners, and now with this cover, he has stopped noticing the stove top at all. It's view is obscured. Even if he was interested he can't reach anything behind the cover. So far it's really giving me piece of mind. It also happens to be nice looking and blends in easily with a 'modern' looking kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Wedidit

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for a center island cooktop!
customer_reviews.text: This stove guard has worked perfectly for us! Our cooktop is on a center island and I was constantly worrying about the kids reaching up to the stove from the other side where I can't see them. Worry no more! This was relatively easy to assemble though I think I was momentarily stuck on the installation portion. I haven't cleaned it yet but I can see it would come apart and go back together rather smoothly (now that I figured out the installation).
customer_reviews.author: EMoney

customer_reviews.title: Great baby safe guard product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product recently and installed it. The height and adjustable width are good. The stainless steel/black color matches my stove and as mentioned on the product description, it doesn't get hot. The sides have a good firm hold. Tip for other customers: Do read the instructions carefully before installing- as it was a bit confusing at first. For example the flat side of the top front panel lines in the middle to meet the flat side of the bottom front panel.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: It looks very nice and sticks well
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed it quickly without the manual but he has experience with assembling other items but I think the installation is easy for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Fireneger Getahun

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best products that I’ve ever purchased. It’s expensive but it’s worth the price. We installed it directly on our countertops because we wanted to cover the stove knobs and it worked perfectly! I was worried that it might retain a lot of heat and it will be too hot to touch, but that’s not the case. We’ve had it for 3 months now and it still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: Really helpful even if you don’t stick it down
customer_reviews.text: We didn’t stick it down but we just put it down and use it as a guard when we are cooking to avoid prying hands. Works great and blocks heat. Adjustable to stove top size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed. No more worries of little hands getting hurt while we cook.
customer_reviews.author: VanJez

customer_reviews.title: Safety comes first with this item
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble. Looks good and keeps children from getting burned.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My 2.5yr old son stands on a stool and touches everything he can. This is perfect for keeping his curious hands safe especially because the sides are protected as well.
customer_reviews.author: Babasmom

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Very good quality and worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but a smart and good design.
customer_reviews.text: Best one I've seen. Easy to install. Didn't need a manual. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Not Heat Resistant
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to install and adheres really well to the surface. However, if you’re getting this to prevent your child from burning his hand, this is pointless. It gets just as hot as the stove and can still burn you (while you’re cooking) or your child.
customer_reviews.author: AReaka21

customer_reviews.title: Well made, quality item
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and Smooth surface, I love it. It goes well With other things in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Tardis

customer_reviews.title: The best cook top protector I could find
customer_reviews.text: Works well, it was easy to install, looks good and it is easily adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: Installation was relatively easy but we cooked later on and the thing got hot. While blocking the stove is great, there’s no point when the surface of it could burn a little hand. Sending it back. I really hoped this was worth the price tag but needs better heat resistant materials.
customer_reviews.author: Diayanu

customer_reviews.title: A good guard for the stovetop
customer_reviews.text: Product did what I wanted, which was to make a sufficiently high and impenetrable border to prevent our ~2 year old from reaching to the hot stovetop. The adhesive seems appropriately strong. The guard only covers the front and part of the sides of the stovetop, so with our kitchen layout the product does leave one back corner of the stovetop accessible from an adjacent walkway, but we avoid using that burner and keep a heavy pot there. Since we've added this, it seems to remove the stovetop from our toddler's itinerary: its out of sight and out of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Green

customer_reviews.title: Safety is priority
customer_reviews.text: Works against curious toddo and looks good. He knows "hot" but as you can see curiosity still prevails.
customer_reviews.author: MillennialMomma

customer_reviews.title: Love the design, but gets hot when cooking.
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. But it does get hot when cooking. So it’ll save your kids from getting burned by the fire and hot pots, but still have to make sure they don’t touch the piece as well since it can get really hot. Love the design
customer_reviews.author: Zhiyu L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It makes our gas range safe and secure. It’s easy to remove and clean around. It gives me great piece of mind when cooking. I know that little hands will not reach the hot burners.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Shondell

product_meta.title: Qdos Adhesive Aluminum Stove Guard - Complements Modern Kitchen Designs - Fits Cooktops & Most Freestanding Stoves - Protects from Front & Sides - Easy to Install - Quick Removal for Cleaning
product_meta.description:
Quality and Higher Standards
Striving for a Higher Standard of Safety
Qdos began with a simple question. How “Safe” is “Safe Enough”? The children’s home safety market has seen very little innovation for decades. As parents, we got frustrated with products that didn’t perform. We knew there was a better way - A Higher Standard of Safety.
feature_bullets: Blends with Modern Kitchen Designs – Finally! A stove guard that complements your beautiful kitchen instead of creating an eyesore.
Protects Your Child from Burns and Scalds - Unlike many other brands, the Qdos Stove Guard not only protects from the front but also the sides.
Installs Easily - Just adjust the width and install with our strong heat resistant adhesive. Fits Cooktops and Most Freestanding Stoves - Adjustable from 22.5” to 38.5”.
Solid Strong Construction - Made from extruded double walled anodized aluminum and heat resistant materials.
Easy to Clean - Take it apart in seconds for cleaning or temporary removal. Simply disassemble and wash with soap and water.
